question: Which sport is also known as "Whiff-Whaff"?
explanation: Table Tennis sport is also known as "Whiff-Whaff". Table tennis, also known as ping-pong and whiff-whaff, is a sport in which two or four players hit a lightweight ball, also known as the ping-pong ball, back and forth across a table using small rackets. The game takes place on a hard table divided by a net.
